column5: does anyone have any information/comments on the lowrance X-87 vs the Eagle 320 fishfinders. was looking at portable models but the equipment would be the same.
Isn't it the exact same model (Fishmark 320/Lowrance x87)? Both are made by the same company. Same box, specs, ect...
I believe the X-87 has a flasher mode and the 320 does not.
X-87 has flasher mode and better backlighting. "Hold on to the boat, boys, she's gonna ram us!"
